AD_Inn_Blackboard4.synopsis: A blackboard in Last Light. This one with about chops and ribs.  Advertising from 100 years ago

AD_NoWeaponsAllowed.synopsis: Sign at the entrance with weapon racks so guest leave their weapons behind and now carry them inside. Sign is from 100 years ago

AD_Inn_Blackboard3.synopsis: A blackboard in Last Light. This one with about ales and beers. Advertising from 100 years ago

AD_Inn_Blackboard2.synopsis: A blackboard in Last Light. This one with pomodoros and veggies. Advertising from 100 years ago

AD_Inn_Blackboard4_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Inn_Blackboard4_0.text: *Only a few words are still legible - 'beef pie, lamb stew, and chicken soup.'*

AD_NoWeaponsAllowed_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_NoWeaponsAllowed_0.text: *The Last Light Inn does not permit the bearing of arms. For the safety of all patrons, please leave your weapons at the door.*

AD_Inn_Blackboard3_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Inn_Blackboard3_0.text: *The colours are faded, but the words are not - 'An ale between friends is worth ten cups of tea!'*

AD_Inn_Blackboard2_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Inn_Blackboard2_0.text: *A faded advertisement, its message still faintly legible: 'Fresh veg and fancy fruit. Buy two, get one free.'*
